issue.title: [CI][NIGHTLY:gandiva-jar-osx] Use latest pygit2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8349](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8349). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that homebrew provides compatible libgit2 version, we can use latest pygit2
